name: Feed the Poochie
description:
Hi! I'm Poochie.

I'm so hungry... Feed me and I'll give you a lot of kilograms!
With them, you'll be able to buy me more food and upgrade all the system.

But don't feed me too much, or I might explode! Don't forget to feed me too, I don't want to die and disappear...

If I'm too big, you can always put me on a diet, even if I don't like it!

Hope you'll take care of me!


Poochie, the dog.

In Feed the Poochie, you're in charge of Poochie, a little dog with a big stomach. He needs food. But always with moderation. Will you be able to feed him without loosing him? Let's see...
